item.title: Running OSTicket on Azure #1
item.description: I recently deployed and configured the excellent OSTicket support ticketing system at my work. This was a fun project where I learned a lot that warrants a series of articles. Architecture: Setting up OSticket for speed and reliability in Azure Prepare the database: Cost, performance and security considerations Prepare the web server: Azure app service, startup script and dealing with cronjobs. Deployment and slots : Leveraging Git and the Azure deployment slot model Configuration management: Environmental variables and the Azure key vault Wishlist.
